GSD.description:
btrfs: prevent copying too big compressed lzo segment

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.12 by commit e326bd06cdde46df952361456232022298281d16. For more details please see the references link.
